metadata.title: Minishades Polarized Classic Kids Sunglasses
description: We have been designing & distributing premium Polarized sunglasses since 1995. Now that we are parents, we are focusing our efforts on protecting our children's eyes. We're tired of our kids wearing non-polarized sunglasses, cheap sunglasses, and/or plastic sunglasses that break. Kids need to cut the glare and relax their eyes just as adults do. In fact, children's eyes are more susceptible to UV damage than adults. So we decided to branch out, Take our 20 years of polarized sunglass experience, and develop the only all polarized brand For little kids....Welcome to mini shades. They are safe, strong, & super cute and are backed by our unbeatable hide n. We hope your kids love them as much as ours do!
metadata.details: {"Item model number": "131082", "Department": "Unisex-child", "Date First Available": "February 21, 2020", "Manufacturer": "Unsinkable Polarized, LLC"}
